message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, considering I made the first offer
I understand you want a larger share for making the first offer, but I think this is a fair counter-offer considering the time value of money.
Considering the inflation is affecting your share, I'm willing to make a slight adjustment, but I still believe I deserve a larger portion
This is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the only fair option, especially considering the money is losing value for me with every passing round.
I understand the money is losing value for you, but I've made concessions and I think this is as fair as it gets
